arts.ttl: Newcastle United's next five games compared to Man City, Nottingham Forest and Chelsea
arts.sum: The Magpies had no response as the Reds took a step closer to the Premier League title, while the Toon stay in sixth after Man City defeated Tottenham Hotspur and Chelsea's win over Southampton. Newcastle United know they lost some ground on Wednesday night in the race for Champions League football after a 2-0 defeat to Liverpool at Anfield.

arts.ttl: What Lewis Hall did before Newcastle United defeat as Liverpool myth rubbished again
arts.sum: Before Wednesday night's 2-0 defeat to Liverpool, however, Hall attempted to explain away the myth that Newcastle are focused on anything but their Premier League and FA Cup exploits at present. Instead, Hall and his Newcastle United team-mates are attempting to focus on the task directly in front of them - despite lingering talk that one eye may already be on the Carabao Cup final in a matter of weeks.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot claims Liverpool players have silenced doubters with ‘mental strength’
arts.sum: Manager delighted after ‘people started to question us’ Praises on-field reaction in 2-0 victory over Newcastle Arne Slot claimed Liverpool silenced the doubters with victory over Newcastle, with an increased lead of 13 points at the top of the Premier League validating his decision to rest senior players in the FA Cup exit at Plymouth. Liverpool stretched their lead over Arsenal with a convincing defeat of Eddie Howe’s side, whom they face in the Carabao Cup final in 18 days’ time, to build on Sunday’s impressive win at Manchester City. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: I saw Alexander Isak's reaction after Newcastle decision as Howe makes choice
arts.sum: But it was not good news for Newcastle fans as Isak was ruled out of the match due to a groin injury. Alexander Isak had not kicked a ball at Anfield but he was arguably Newcastle United's most storied player last night.

arts.ttl: Liverpool close in on 90-year-old goalscoring record following Newcastle United win
arts.sum: Liverpool beat Newcastle United 2-0 on Wednesday night, and the result saw them match a 90-year-old record as they head 13 points ahead of Arsenal in the title race.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot hints at Newcastle theory after what he saw during Liverpool win
arts.sum: Arne Slot's Liverpool are due to face Newcastle United in the Carabao Cup final on March 16, with the teams getting a dress rehearsal in the Premier League on Wednesday

arts.ttl: Liverpool ease past Newcastle to go 13 points clear at the top
arts.sum: This win brought an end to a gruelling stretch of the season for Liverpool, who have played five league games in the space of two weeks. Liverpool moved 13 points clear at the top of the Premier League table with a 2-0 win over Newcastle United at a jubilant Anfield on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United issue Alexander Isak injury update after surprise Liverpool decision
arts.sum: Newcastle United Eddie Howe is hopeful that Alexander Isak will not miss the Carabao Cup final against Liverpool next month. After the Liverpool game, Howe said: "It goes without saying how important he (Isak) is to us.

arts.ttl: Liverpool fans say one player gave his best ever display in a Reds shirt in win over Newcastle
arts.sum: Liverpool have gone 13 points clear at the top of the Premier League table following their 2-0 win over Newcastle United on Wednesday night. The...

arts.ttl: Slot praises 'great squad performance' after Newcastle win
arts.sum: Liverpool head coach Arne Slot says his side's 2-0 Premier League win over Newcastle United was a "great squad performance".
